    • Method Detail

      • writeSource

        public boolean writeSource(String sourceLocation,
                           String sourceName,
                           String content)
        Description copied from interface: TextSourceModel
        Writes data into a source.
        Specified by:
        writeSource in interface TextSourceModel
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - Location or path to the source, which can be a directory, a database schema or a network location.
        sourceName - Name of the specific information source, which can be a file, database structure(s) or a network resource.
        content - String to be written. It will replace the original content
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, false otherwise.

      • createSource

        public boolean createSource(String sourceLocation,
                            String sourceName)
        Description copied from interface: TextSourceModel
        Creates a data source in the specified location
        Specified by:
        createSource in interface TextSourceModel
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - Location or path to the source, which can be a directory, a database schema or a network location.
        sourceName - Name of the specific information source, which can be a file, database structure(s) or a network resource.
        Returns:
        true if the source was successfully created, false if there were errors or the source already existed.

      • readSource

        public String readSource(String sourceLocation,
                         String sourceName)
        Description copied from interface: TextSourceModel
        Reads the contents of a source.
        Specified by:
        readSource in interface TextSourceModel
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - Location or path to the source, which can be a directory, a database schema or a network location.
        sourceName - Name of the specific information source, which can be a file, database structure(s) or a network resource.
        Returns:
        Content of the source.

      • existsSource

        public boolean existsSource(String sourceLocation,
                            String sourceName)
        Description copied from interface: TextSourceModel
        Checks if a data source already exists.
        Specified by:
        existsSource in interface TextSourceModel
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - Location or path to the source, which can be a directory, a database schema or a network location.
        sourceName - Name of the specific information source, which can be a file, database structure(s) or a network resource.
        Returns:
        true if the location exists, false otherwise.

      • openSource

        public boolean openSource(String sourceLocation)
        Description copied from interface: TextSourceModel
        Opens the source location
        Specified by:
        openSource in interface TextSourceModel
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - String with the location to be opened. For database connections, attempts to open the connection and checks if the schema is correct
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if there are any errors.

      • listSources

        public String[] listSources(String sourceLocation)
        Description copied from interface: TextSourceModel
        Returns a list of all the available data sources in a given location
        Specified by:
        listSources in interface TextSourceModel
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - Location to be searched. It will be directory for text files, the schema for database connections or a network location for network connections.
        Returns:
        String array with the list of sources. null if the sourceLocation parameter is not correct or does not correspond to a directory.
